column2: the dessert was a huge failure. They were stone cold and did not have that wow factor that desserts have. The peach cobbler was just completely one note. The crunch on top was soggy
column3: the peaches in syrup should have been bubbling so create that warmness in peach cobbler
column4: and there was no pastry base to it. It was more of a crumble then a cobbler. The bread pudding was so dense
column6: and dry. It needed more of that pecan caramel topping on it. The topping was actually pretty good. It added that necessary crunch to the bread pudding.
